„ÄêStocking Stuffers for Men„Äë‚Äî BIIB multi-tool pen with personalised gifts box are unique gifts for dads, men, husbands, boyfriends, grandpa on Father’s Day, Christmas, birthday, thanksgiving day or anniversary. Anyone who receives BIIB multifunctional pen as a gift will love it!
„ÄêMens Gifts for Christmas„Äë‚Äî The multifunction tool pen comes with 9 very handy functions: twist ballpoint pen/ ruler/ screwdriver (flat & phillips)/ bottle opener (can act as phone holder)/ stylus/ level/ LED flashlight. This cool gadgets for men can be the unique gifts for husbands/dads/fathers/men/boyfriend/him.
„Äê9-in-1 Multitool Pen Set„Äë‚Äî The packaging of this 9-in-1 tool pen is exquisite, very suitable as a gift for your loved one. Three extra black ink refills are fluent, durable and easy to install, guaranteeing the reusability of pens.
„ÄêWhite Elephant Gifts for Adults„Äë‚Äî 9-in-1 tool pen is made of super-strong aluminium material to be used for a long time. Due to its small size and unique design. Not only a cool gadget in daily use, but also a tools gifts for dad from kids, easy to use and carry.
„ÄêGreat Satisfying Service„Äë‚Äî 9-in-1 Multifunctional pen set with three extra ink refill, exquisite gift box, 30-day money-back guarantee, 12-month product replacement warranty and friendly customer service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, and we’ll serve you the best.

Are you troubled with finding the tools when in need?


Own one pen. You can have 9 different tools! BIIB 9 in 1 Multifunctional Pen is an ideal, innovative and practical gadget that may help you save much time and make your work easier, convenient to carry around.

One for All – Cool Gadgets Gifts for Men

BIIB 9-1 Tool Pen – Stocking Stuffers for Men & Women

The novel and useful BIIB 9 in 1 Multifunctional Pen will be the best gifts your father received on Father’s Day, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, and many more other festivals.

3 Batteries & 3 Pen refills Included

and 3 spare batteries to meet your needs.

[Perfect Gifts for Men] ‚ÄîAre you still hesitating about what gift to your dad/husband/boyfriend? If he likes camping, hiking, picnicking, fishing, climbing and other outdoorsy sports, the BIIB multitool hammer is a perfect gift idea. Whether Christmas, father’s day, birthday, anniversary or Valentine’s day gifts, this personalized gift will bring happiness to the person you give it!
[12-in-1 Multitool Hammer] ‚ÄîBIIB tool hammer with 12 functions, including a mini hammer, nail claw, pliers, regular pliers, pipe cutter, knife, saw, serrated knife, file, flathead screwdrivers, Phillips screwdrivers, bottle opener, this is a most useful tool in daily life. And this unique design hammer is a perfect choice of gifts for men who like camping, mountaineering, home renovation or DIY jobs.
[Practical & Cool Gadgets]‚ÄîThe best gift choice for handymen, hunters, fishermen, or DIY dads. This multitool hammer is a cool gadget for hands-on guys. Get one for your boyfriend, dad, grandpa, or husband as a unique gift. They will love it!
[Portable & Convenient]‚ÄîThe size of this hammer is only 13.5cm. Come with a portable and easy-to-carry nylon case. It can be kept in backpacks, insect-proof kits, cars, hiking, camping gear, or at home. You can use this hammer with multitool accessories almost anywhere!
[Quality Assurance ]‚ÄîBIIB tool hammers are made of premium stainless steel that’s rust, corrosion-resistant, and tough enough to stand up to all your hands-on projects. A lightweight stainless steel multitool hammer can reduce the burden of going out or hiking. It is a must-have addition to anyone’s camping gear and equipment. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us, and we will solve them for you as soon as possible.


Are you looking for a unique gift for your husband or father? BIIB mini hammer multitool is your best choice!

BIIB 12 in 1 Multi-tools Including-- Mini hammer, nail claw, pliers, regular pliers, pipe cutter, knife, saw, serrated knife, file, flathead screwdrivers, phillips screwdrivers, bottle opener, good camping gear and equipment.

Easy to Carry-- Our mini hammer multitool is made of durable stainless steel; you can easily slip it inside your pocket. This camping gadget is also equipped with a black carrying case attached to the belt.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS APPLY TO VARIOUS SITUATIONS IN YOUR LIFE

Perfect Gifts for Men/Dad/Husband/Boyfriend/Him etc. Well-Build Multitool for Camping, Daily-Use, Hiking, Fishing, etc.
